content.query:
USE datascience2022;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.DimPerson
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/business/lakehouse/dimperson/Year=2022/Month=04/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )  
 AS
WITH CustomerIDNotNull (CustomerID, PersonID, CustomerAlternativeKey)  
AS  
(  
    SELECT c.CustomerID, c.PersonID, c.AccountNumber
    FROM stagingDim.Customer c 
    WHERE c.PersonID IS NOT NULL 
) 
SELECT c.CustomerID AS CustomerKey, 
c.CustomerAlternativeKey AS CustomerAlternativeKey, 
p.Title AS Title, p.FirstName AS FirstName, 
p.MiddleName AS MiddleName, p.LastName AS LastName,
p.Suffix AS Suffix  
FROM stagingDim.Person p  
INNER JOIN CustomerIDNotNull c
ON c.PersonID = p.BusinessEntityID
INNER JOIN stagingDim.PersonPhone ph
ON c.PersonID = ph.BusinessEntityID
INNER JOIN stagingDim.EmailAddress em
ON c.PersonID = em.BusinessEntityID
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.DimProduct
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/business/lakehouse/dimproduct/Year=2022/Month=04/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )  
 AS
SELECT p.ProductID AS ProductID, 
p.Name AS ProductName, 
p.ProductNumber AS ProductAlternativeKey, 
p.FinishedGoodsFlag AS FinishedGoodsFlag, 
p.Color AS Color,
p.SafetyStockLevel AS SafetyStockLevel,
p.ReorderPoint AS ReorderPoint,
p.StandardCost AS StandardCost,
p.ListPrice AS ListPrice,
p.Size AS Size,
p.ProductLine AS ProductLine,
p.Class AS Class,
p.Style AS Style,
p.SellStartDate AS SellStartDate,
p.SellEndDate AS SellEndDate,
p.DiscontinuedDate AS DiscontinuedDate,
pc.ProductCategoryName AS ProductCategoryName,
psc.Name AS ProductSubCategoryName
FROM stagingDim.Product p  
INNER JOIN stagingDim.ProductSubcategory psc
ON p.ProductSubCategoryID = psc.ProductSubCategoryID
INNER JOIN stagingDim.ProductCategory pc
ON pc.ProductCategoryID = psc.ProductCategoryID
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.FactInternetSales
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/business/lakehouse/factinternetsales/Year=2022/Month=04/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
)  
AS
SELECT
sod.ProductID AS ProductKey,
Convert(CHAR(8),soh.OrderDate,112) AS OrderDateKey,
Convert(CHAR(8),soh.DueDate,112) AS DueDateKey,
soh.CustomerID AS CustomerKey,
soh.SalesOrderNumber,
sod.SpecialOfferID AS SpecialOfferKey,
SUM(sod.UnitPrice*sod.OrderQty) AS TotalCost,
SUM(sod.OrderQty) AS TotalOrderQuantity,
SUM(sod.UnitPriceDiscount) AS TotalDiscount
FROM stagingDim.SalesOrderHeader soh 
INNER JOIN stagingDim.SalesOrderDetail sod 
ON soh.SalesOrderID = sod.SalesOrderID
GROUP BY sod.ProductID,sod.SpecialOfferID,soh.OrderDate,soh.DueDate,CustomerID,soh.SalesOrderNumber
GO

--Transacional con particion
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.DimDate(
    DateKey INT,
    FullDateAlternateKey DATE
) WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/lakehouse/dimdate/DimDate.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = UPCSVWithHEADERFORMAT
);
GO
